item.title: 调查显示：策略师押注亚洲股市跑赢美股
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，由于估值和盈利前景具有吸引力，本季度亚洲股市的表现有望超过美国股市。【原文：Asian stocks are poised to outperform US counterparts in the current quarter on attractive valuations and earnings prospects, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 西班牙可再生能源的蓬勃发展放松了天然气对电价的控制
item.description: 西班牙可再生能源产量的飙升正在削弱天然气对电价的控制，使该国有别于仍由化石燃料决定电力成本的欧洲大部分国家。【原文：Soaring renewables output in Spain is weakening gas’s grip on electricity prices, setting the country apart from much of Europe where fossil fuels still dictate the cost of power.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议召开前美国库存增加，石油保持跌势
item.description: 美国原油库存三周来首次增加，在周末举行的欧佩克+会议可能导致更多闲置供应恢复之前，原油持续下跌。【原文：Oil held a run of losses after US crude inventories expanded for the first time in three weeks, ahead of an OPEC+ meeting on the weekend that will likely lead to the return of more idled supply.】

item.title: 自民党投票在即，日本将出售基准债券，前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 日本将于周四出售基准 10 年期债券，就在执政党选举新领导人的前两天，这次关键投票将决定财政和经济政策。【原文：Japan will sell benchmark 10-year bonds on Thursday, just two days before the ruling party elects a new leader in a key vote that will determine fiscal and economic policy.】

item.title: 香港股市开盘前您需要了解的信息
item.description: 纳斯达克金龙中国指数周三上涨 1.4%，至 8759.71 点。S&P 500 指数上涨 0.3%。【原文：The Nasdaq Golden Dragon China Index rose 1.4% Wednesday to 8,759.71. The S&P 500 rose 0.3%.】

item.title: S.一次性电信费削减结束后韩国通胀回升
item.description: 随着临时削减通信费的影响减弱和食品价格上涨，韩国的消费通胀加快，为央行本月晚些时候降低借贷成本蒙上了阴影。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation quickened as the impact of temporary cuts to communications fees faded and food prices rose, clouding the case for the central bank to lower borrowing costs later this month.】

item.title: 出于对估值的担忧，Amundi 放宽对中国的押注，关注更安全的投资项目
item.description: 由于对中国经济前景的疑虑挥之不去，Amundi SA 已在很大程度上从中国 9 月份的股市上涨中套现，将其持有的更多股票重新配置到红利股票上。【原文：Amundi SA has largely cashed out of China’s September equity rally, reallocating more of its holdings to dividend stocks amid lingering doubts about the country’s economic outlook.】

item.title: 交易商认为亚太地区在并购失利后将重回正轨
item.description: 由于一些潜在的巨额交易未能实现，亚太地区的创雨者在第三季度经历了一波三折。【原文：Rainmakers in Asia Pacific had a bumpy third quarter as some potentially huge deals failed to materialize.】

item.title: 交易员摆脱美国关门影响，股市创下历史新高：市场综述
item.description: 周三，全球股市收盘创下新高，交易商们摆脱了美国政府近七年来首次关门的影响，亚洲股市也随之上涨。【原文：Asian equities were primed for gains after global stocks ended Wednesday at a fresh high as traders shrugged off the first US government shutdown in nearly seven years.】

item.title: 芝加哥联储主席称关门期间缺乏数据对央行行长来说 "很成问题
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，在美国政府关门期间，官方数据的缺乏将使央行行长们更难解读经济。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said a lack of official data while the US government is shut down will make it harder for central bankers to interpret the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普就中国贸易谈判发出信号提振大豆价格
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将向中国国家主席习近平施压，要求他在月底两人会晤时重新开始购买大豆作物，此后大豆价格周三反弹。【原文：Soybean prices bounced back on Wednesday after US President Donald Trump said he would press Chinese President Xi Jinping to restart purchases of the crop when the two meet at the end of the month.】

item.title: 苹果搁置视觉头盔改版，优先考虑类似元的人工智能眼镜
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）暂停了对其 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机的大修计划，将资源转向更紧迫的工作：开发可与 Meta Platforms 公司产品相媲美的智能眼镜。【原文：Apple Inc. has hit pause on a planned overhaul to its Vision Pro headset to redirect resources toward a more urgent effort: developing smart glasses that can rival products from Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普公布 10 万美元签证费，印度工人面临 H-1B 危机
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take Asia "播客中，我们将探讨特朗普10万美元的H-1B签证费对印度员工和全球劳动力的意义。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, we explore what Trump’s $100,000 H-1B visa fee means for Indian employees and the global workforce.

】

item.title: Shawbrook 将考虑在未来几天内提交伦敦首次公开募股申请
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由 BC Partners 和 Pollen Street 支持的英国银行 Shawbrook Group Plc 正在考虑在未来几天内宣布可能在伦敦进行首次公开募股的计划。【原文：Shawbrook Group Plc, the British bank backed by BC Partners and Pollen Street, is considering announcing plans for a potential initial public offering in London as soon as in the coming days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 统治日本几十年的政党岌岌可危
item.description:

The Liberal Democratic Party picks a new leader as it struggles to restore its fortunes

item.title: 贝森特拯救阿根廷的承诺面临比索交易商攻击的考验
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）作为不守规矩市场的有力安抚者的记录现在正在阿根廷经受考验，那里的投资者正在质疑他上周承诺支持哈维尔-米莱总统的价值。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s record as a powerful pacifier of unruly markets is now being put to the test in Argentina, where investors are questioning the value of his pledge of support last week for President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 高盛接近达成杜邦公司 40 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团正在牵头进行一笔 37.5 亿美元的债务交易，为 Arclin 公司收购杜邦公司的芳纶业务提供资金。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is leading a $3.75 billion debt deal to fund Arclin Inc.’s acquisition of DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s Aramids business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 数据中心在 PJM 拍卖中增加了 73 亿美元的供应成本
item.description: 数据中心的蓬勃发展为美国最大的电网增加了 73 亿美元的供电成本，使从中西部到大西洋中部近五分之一的美国人的电费上涨。【原文：The data center boom added $7.3 billion in power-supply costs on the largest US grid, raising bills for nearly a fifth of Americans from the Midwest to the mid-Atlantic.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司董事会为危机后重组巴西石油公司制定立场战略
item.description: 随着石化巨头巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）危机的升级，巴西石油公司董事会已开始制定战略，如果巴西石油公司进行重组，该如何定位。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA’s board has started strategizing how to position itself should Braskem SA be restructured as the crisis at the petrochemicals giant escalates.】

item.title: 哈德逊湾床浴交易收益诉讼案获撤诉
item.description: 哈德逊湾资本管理公司（Hudson Bay Capital Management）赢得了对前 Bed Bath & Beyond Inc.【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management won dismissal of a lawsuit by the former Bed Bath & Beyond Inc. alleging the hedge fund wrongly sidestepped stock ownership rules during the retailer’s downward spiral.】

item.title: 最高法院库克令对美联储的救济可能稍纵即逝
item.description: 美国最高法院拒绝允许唐纳德-特朗普总统立即赶走美联储理事丽莎-库克，这缓解了央行面临的压力，此前数月白宫对美联储的严厉批评威胁到了央行的独立性。【原文：The US Supreme Court’s refusal to allow President Donald Trump to immediately oust Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook has eased pressure on the central bank after months of searing criticism from the White House that threatened its independence.】

item.title: 金融时报》报道：英国正考虑为 IPO 交易减税
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国政府正在权衡一项计划，对新上市公司股票免征交易税，以缓解被视为伦敦金融城主要阻力的股票交易税。【原文：The UK government is weighing a plan to exempt shares of newly listed companies from a tax on trading, an attempt to ease what’s seen as a key drag on the City of London, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省支持新建输油管道以促进加拿大对亚洲的石油出口
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省将带头努力建设一条通往太平洋沿岸的新石油管道，该项目将使加拿大向亚洲市场的原油运输量增加一倍以上。【原文：Alberta will spearhead an effort to build a new oil pipeline to the Pacific coast, a project that would allow Canada to more than double its shipments of crude to Asian markets.】

item.title: 竞争对手亚马逊加强在巴西的业务，MercadoLibre 出现下滑
item.description: 由于担心亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）在巴西的最新举动会加剧电子商务领域的竞争，MercadoLibre 公司的股价正在经历自 11 月以来最大的两日暴跌。【原文：Shares of MercadoLibre Inc. are heading for their biggest two-day slump since November on concern that Amazon.com Inc.’s latest move in Brazil will ramp up competition in the e-commerce segment.】

item.title: 比索连续第三天下跌，米莱政府再次出售美元
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，阿根廷政府周三在现货市场上抛售美元，以阻止比索的暴跌，目前比索暴跌已进入第三天。【原文：Argentina’s government sold dollars in the spot market on Wednesday to stem a slump in the peso that is now in its third day, according to two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言就中国拒绝购买美国大豆一事与之对抗
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将就中国政府拒绝购买美国大豆一事与中国国家主席习近平交涉，这是世界上两个最大经济体之间关系日益紧张的一个领域。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he would confront Chinese President Xi Jinping over Beijing’s refusal to purchase American soybeans, a growing area of tension between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 有报道称英特尔正在洽谈将 AMD 增为其客户，英特尔因此获益
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）股价攀升达 6.8%，此前 Semafor 报道称，该公司正在洽谈将先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Intel Corp. shares climbed as much as 6.8% after Semafor reported that the company is in talks to add Advanced Micro Devices Inc. as a customer for its manufacturing business.】

item.title: 萨默斯称米兰发表了记忆中最软弱的美联储理事讲话
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）对斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）作为美联储理事发表的首次讲话进行了抨击，称其未能为削减利率提供适当的分析依据。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers blasted Stephen Miran’s first speech as Federal Reserve governor, saying it failed to provide a proper analytical basis for slashing interest rates.】

item.title: 能源转让公司与 EIG 旗下 MidOcean 公司接近敲定美国液化天然气供应协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，能源转运公司（Energy Transfer LP）即将达成协议，向投资公司 EIG Global Energy Partners 旗下子公司 MidOcean Energy 出售其计划中的路易斯安那州查尔斯湖出口终端的液化天然气。【原文：Energy Transfer LP is nearing an agreement to sell liquefied natural gas from its planned Lake Charles export terminal in Louisiana to MidOcean Energy, a subsidiary of investment firm EIG Global Energy Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Clearlake 支持的 RSA Security 与债权人恢复债务谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Clearlake Capital Group 支持的 RSA Security 公司已恢复与部分贷款人就债务问题进行讨论，而今年早些时候谈判曾一度降温。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group-backed RSA Security has resumed discussions with some of its lenders over its debt, after talks cooled off earlier this year, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
